website_summaries.verdict: The gold standard for cleaning modest-size makeup brush collections.
pros: Helpful for people with joint problems
Helps extend the life of your brushes
Features seven patented textures to wash eye and face brushes
Includes suction cups on the back
cons: Not recommended for use with beautyblender sponges

customer_reviews.title: Love this Brush Cleaning Mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Brush Cleaning Mat and the suction cups easily hold it in place. I love the different textures on the mat so you can really clean different brush types and densities easily and thoroughly. The mat itself is easy to clean when you are done with a little Dawn dish soap (removes any oils or leftover makeup from the mat). I highly recommend this and I used it with my Beauty Blender Bar (large bar in the black container) and had amazingly clean soft brushes in no time. Highly recommend this cleaning mat.
customer_reviews.author: JumperRider

customer_reviews.title: Too messy
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this. I read so many great reviews and could not wait to get it. I hate cleaning my brushes because I feel like I can't get them clean so I ordered this. It's a mess seriously cleaning this thing is the worst. The foundation sticks to the materially and it's gross. I used it once then I just put it in a drawer. For eye brushes it was not bad but wasn't amazing. No joke the fondation and blush brushes had this thing like caked up in the grooves and was just a disaster. I don't even wear that much face makeup
customer_reviews.author: Jsnissan

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL
customer_reviews.text: MUST HAVE. I use about twelve brushes to do a full face of makeup on the days that I am so inclined. And I wash them all every time I use them to keep them clean and make sure they don't break my skin out from getting bacteria in them from the liquid products sitting in the bristles. So this mat is a god send. It is so easy to use to get even the most stubborn of foundations out of brushes to the littlest of eyeshadow out of delicate blending brushes. I couldn't live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette Valentine

customer_reviews.title: #lifehack
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I'm writing a review for a silicone mat, but this thing might just rank up there with my top 10 life hacks. This mat helped get my brushes super clean, and the labeled textures are idiot-proof. Took about 15 minutes to clean 20 brushes; I used Sonia Kashuk brush cleaning solution this week and will test with Dr Brommers Castile soap next week. I was simultaneously overjoyed and disgusted by the amount of makeup/foundation/concealer was coming off these brushes, and whistling while I worked. if you like blackhead extraction videos or just having clean brushes to put on your face, then this product is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cara J.

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Truly the best thing I ever found. It has made cleaning all my makeup brushes and sponges so easy. I usually clean everything on Sunday and I usually have upwards of 15 brunches and a few sponges to clean. It would take so long before this mat but now I can get it done fast. The best thing is the brushes are cleaned all the way through!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly P.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended but expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly b/c of the larger size - there are many copycat versions on Amazon for much cheaper, but they're significantly smaller. As I wait to wash until I have significant number of dirty brushes (don't worry, I have multiples of them :) for efficiency's sake, I wanted a larger brush mat to wash several brushes at once. This in fact works great for that. One star docked for expensive pricing for what it does though - paying for the brand name!
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mat!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is amazing!! It thoroughly and quickly cleans your makeup brushes. No more wasting time at the sink to get the job done! Clean your brushes and move on with your day. The express mat is the perfect size for me as I have a small bathroom sink and this one fit perfectly. I had the regular sized version and that one was way too large- it's better for a kitchen sink if that's where you're washing your brushes.
customer_reviews.author: KO83

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This product gets my makeup brushes clean so quickly and it is so satisfying to watch all the makeup wash out! The brushes come out looking brand new! Super easy. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah DeVivo

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas, she has been wanting a brush mat. She really loves it and said it cleans her brushes better than before she had it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Great suction, fits my uncommon sink shape, easy to use, no more hassle cleaning my brushes. Item is as described, well worth the price. I bought more to give as gifts. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sydnee

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Much to my surprise and pleasure, it does just what it is designed to do--cuts cleaning time down to a minute or so for the large facial brushes and they really get clean; smaller brushes take even less time. This is a must have to keep brushes fresh. Highly recommend. Also purchased the Sigmagic Brushampoo; it was worth the additional cost to streamline the tedious job of cleaning all my brushes. It was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Streeter

customer_reviews.title: youtube made me buy it
customer_reviews.text: I had this saved in my cart for months. I just didn’t want to spend the money on a piece of rubber. lol Nikkiajoy on YouTube finally convinced me after watching her brush cleaning video though. She’s right! It’s a miracle worker. My brushes feel brand new now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Okay this is the new "best beauty tool!" If you use brushes, especially for liquid foundation, this mat is a necessity. I'm now buying them for my daughters as presents. I'm using Bare Minerals brush shampoo with it. Just don't buy the really big on - too big and clumsy - complete overkill.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great investment.
customer_reviews.text: I have a moderate brush collection. This seems to give me a much deeper clean than just using my hand as I have in the past. It also seems to be much faster. In my opinion very worth the price to help increase the life span of my brushes. It's very effective but still gentle and not damaging. It seems to be good quality and I imagine will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Price

customer_reviews.title: A must have for super clean brushes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my daughter who is a professional make up artist. She loved it. She said it thouraghly cleaned her brushed while protecting them. I highly recommend this for personal as well as professional use. Using brushes on the eyes and anywhere on your face or someone else's face, MUST BE CLEAN and this little mat did the job really well!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect to clean my makeup brushes. Very practical, quick and easy. Leaves muy brushes very clean. It's very easy to clean after using and dries quickly and doesnt take alot of room to keep it stored (i place it back in its plastic container that i came in once it dries). The suction at the bottom side really help keep it in place when cleaning the brushes making it much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M.

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Clean makeup brushes!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid I'd regret buying this, but it works great –cleans brushes faster than any other method I've tried. The design is great; some science went into this. Good investment for anyone with a brush collection they wish to take care of.
customer_reviews.author: MiddleAgedWhiteLady

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick and easy brush cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Although it doesn't fit the best in my sink and there are cheap off brand replicas available it still works great and makes cleaning my make up brushes easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this has been so much better! Really helps the cleaning process of my makeup ...
customer_reviews.text: I was using my hand before, but this has been so much better! Really helps the cleaning process of my makeup brushes. It WOULD get slightly discolored and covered in a film of old makeup, after each use, but I found Mrs. Meyers hand soap cleans it all right up.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: SkincareK gives two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money. It's a production to wash all your brushes and correctly. This product makes it easy and it just sits in your sink!! All women should own one of these.
customer_reviews.author: SkincareK

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and sturdy.. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We were not sure if it would od the job but it DOES. Large so you can room to clean your brush. Fits perfectly in your sink.. Comes with detailed information on how to use the sections on the pad to clean your makeup brushes.. Convenient and sturdy.. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jan Shan

customer_reviews.title: I really love this mat
customer_reviews.text: I really love this mat!!! I used to use a small egg shaped one but I have too many brushes now that buyin this mat has made brush washing a breeze, and less messier. I strongly recommend buying this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Mendez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! saves soo much time!
customer_reviews.text: Works AMAZING I love this thing It took me a while to get use to it but you can clearly see your brushes getting clean. Once they're clean, there's a refiner which is honestly the hardest step for me prior to using this
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Cami

customer_reviews.title: Great mat to clean your brushes QUICKLY!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I love how I can wash all my brushes quickly and efficiently! It doesn't take much time washing brushes with this mat - Definitely recommend this for anyone who uses makeup on a daily basis!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Spilman

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning make up off brushes easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice being able to get a deep clean on my brushes. I just use a small dot of Dawn dish soap and scrub were it says to. I clean my brushes until I hear a little squeak. Makes cleaning brushes fun, and its quick and easy. Love my mat.
customer_reviews.author: NIkiC83

customer_reviews.title: No Wonder This Mat Is Patented
customer_reviews.text: No wonder this thing has a patent. I just used my new Sigma Spa Brush Cleaning Mat for the first time and my brushes are cleaner than when I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: chippotle

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST have!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AMAZING! I would give it more stars if I could. I hated cleaning my makeup brushes, it took forever and I felt like they were never as clean as I wanted them to be. But using this mat has been life changing. My brushes are cleaner now than they have been in forever and cleaning them was super fast and super easy. If you use brushes to apply your makeup this is a MUST. Seriously, this thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: ott3rpop

customer_reviews.title: Love this guy!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been considering the glove that sigma makes for brush cleaning but am so glad I got this instead! I barely had to touch the brushes. My fingers were not pruned up when I was done. This is a lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Best cleansing product ever
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot to clean my brushes deep and have them like brand new, this is the best product I have ever used, I am so in love with it. With just some of my brush cleansing solution and this mat the are cleaner than ever!!! Best buy so worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Cut my makeup brush washing time in half
customer_reviews.text: I've used this with plenty of different soaps, and it cleans all of my brushes well and is super easy to clean! It cut my brush washing time in half.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: 20 dollars is a lot for what is essentially a piece of texturized rubber. However, I have always dreaded washing my makeup brushes and have always felt there was no way to do it by hand. After receiving this product, I've used it 2 times so far to wash several brushes each time. Washing brushes is no longer a chore. It's quick and effectively cleans the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Brunette Baby

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Cleans my mats very well. Helpful tip, instead of spending too much on brush cleaners I use my body wash from Bed Bath and Body Works. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Must have for makeup lovers.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mat! It's super easy to use: just use a cleaner and swirl your brushes around. I cleaned stained white brushes and it all came out. I managed to clean 20 brushes in less than 10 minutes. Highly recommend if you're over pruney fingers and stained tips.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: A must have to clean makeup brushes!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how much I needed one of these until I got it! My makeup brushes are so much cleaner now. Easy to use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Not a must have, but definitely helps with eye-shadow brushes. Had to wash some of my foundation brushes a few times and they still felt like there was some residue on them. Overall, does a much better job than me just using the palm of my hand to scrub the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflwrz

customer_reviews.title: Yesss!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good for deep cleaning brushes. I pop this baby righ into my sink and pull up a still.. best deep cleaning my brushes have had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: l LOVE everything Sigma from their brushes to this spa mat
customer_reviews.text: l LOVE everything Sigma from their brushes to this spa mat. I have their glove and enjoy switching it up on occasion. Makes cleaning my brushes so easy. Not alot of mess.
customer_reviews.author: lilemie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Kind of expensive for what you're getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Kind of expensive for what you're getting (since there are a lot of DIY versions online)... but, pretty good nonetheless. I like the different textures and how well the mat sticks to my sink yay!
customer_reviews.author: Y. M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Super easy to use to clean my make up brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B

customer_reviews.title: A must for any makeup junkie
customer_reviews.text: It's a little high on price for the size, but it's worth it for the thoroughly clean & rinsed brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! My brushes are mostly Real Techniques with one or two high end (IT, Lancôme). I used mild soap (Johnson's Baby Wash) and followed the directions on the package. Brushes came out super clean and the washing process was easy. I purchased for $25 which is the same price as the Sigma website and used Prime free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: DBJLLG

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size for my sink and the larger one would ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I wish I would have bought this sooner - couldn't believe how clean it gets my brushes! It's the perfect size for my sink and the larger one would have definitely been too large. Worth the money and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I cant believe I have wasted all this time in my life hand cleaning my ...
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe I have wasted all this time in my life hand cleaning my make up brushes. This mat works so quickly to clean your brushes much better than by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Greenhaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes brush washing a breeze and it cleans thoroughly and well. I'd definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: sunnydaytoday

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I had to do several swirling around the Mat ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I felt like I had to do several swirling around the Mat to really clean my brushes. In retrospect I should of got the larger one
customer_reviews.author: R. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for make-up pros or beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard so many amazing things about this product -- I knew I had to try it for myself! As a beauty blogger and makeup aficionado, keeping my brushes clean is very important to me. A lot of people don't realize how many germs can live in your makeup brushes, especially if you do touch-ups throughout the day. I do a deep cleaning of my brushes weekly by using my Prism Brush Bar and this mat. I usein between deep cleanings to change colors and products. I like the size of the Express Brush Cleaning Mat as it fits well in my sink and is easy to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ardillo

customer_reviews.title: Fell in love with this as soon as I got it
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with this as soon as I got it. I like the size of the mat, fits perfectly in my bathroom sink. Seems like a lot of people had complaints on the full size saying it was too big but this one is perfect. I actually don't mind cleaning my make up brushes now. This makes it such a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Brianda Liebengood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly to clean brushes well, gets most if not all makeup off.
customer_reviews.author: Lizette

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. Works great for cleaning all my brushes and super easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's an easy product one side is for face brushes other side for eyes

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I am over the moon about this brush mat. It washes them so much quicker than by hand.

customer_reviews.title: A great product, nice size and even fun to use
customer_reviews.text: A great product, nice size and even fun to use. However my foundation brush needed extra work to get clean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cleans my brushes way better than just using my hand.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really convenient for cleaning a lot of brushes at once.

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love my cleaner mat. Very easy to clean my brushes.💖

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works!! I'm so glad I bought it! I cleaned all my brushes (40) and they really got clean.

customer_reviews.title: Class Act Tool! Essential for Your Beauty Wardrobe!
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted by this little gadget! The way the mat is separated into washing stages is genious. Cleaned my brushes beautifully, and quickly too! Works for both synthetic and natural brushes. Received this item very, very fast! Two days sooner than expected, in fact. Another hit from Sigma!!
customer_reviews.author: OliviaAlane

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend. This size is perfect too
customer_reviews.text: Luv it!! Worth the price. My brushes get squeaky clean using this mat. I would recommend. This size is perfect too.

customer_reviews.title: Great clean
customer_reviews.text: A little small for me but gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: makes a necessary but dreaded chore quicker and easier -great product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use it ALL the time. Cleans my brushes with ease
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Cuts down on cleaning time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves it. She has about 50 brushes and she used to clean them with her hands. This cut down on time and she was so stoked when she opened the package!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cappe

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize I bought the small one at first but either way I love it. I got so tired of using the small egg one that goes on your fingers. Glad I made the purchase. As I get more brushes I may get the bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea DeBerry

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it - very excited about this purchase. The item is currently sold out on the Sigma website, so I was thankful Amazon had it in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is everything! Cleans brushes so well!!! Has cut down my time by a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hedgepeth

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for anything better it's well designed
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for anything better it's well designed. Now I can clean all my brushes. After washing once dry they're brand new. Thank you guys. I received it on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lorene Elvy

customer_reviews.title: Cleans brushes like nothing else!
customer_reviews.text: This little handle cleaning pad works amazing. Cleans my brushes like nothing else mland there's a video on YouTube that shows you just how to use it for best results.
customer_reviews.author: C F

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't sure about this given the semi-hefty price, but it cuts the time to wash my brushes by about 75%. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney R

customer_reviews.title: Never had a cleaner makeup brush!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I clean my brushes got before when I was washing them just using water and my hands. My brushes feel and look brand new! Easy to use and well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Brush cleaning is a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is amazing! It makes cleaning your brushes so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McCaffrey

customer_reviews.title: A must-have!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Love how small it is and helps me cut my washing time in half. Makes cleaning in my brushes a breeze. I plan on buying for the makeup lovers in my life =)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great companion for brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Save my hands from getting dried out, and makes cleaning brushes a bit less of a chore.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning my brushes has never been easier. The suction cups on the bottom really hold tight and keep the mat from moving in the sink no matter how hard you scrub. It has gotten foundation out of Kabuki Brushes that I thought would never be cleaned. I pair it with the beauty blender brush cleaning bar. Perfect combo for me!

customer_reviews.title: Sooo happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It cleAned my brushes really good! & exactly as in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Jessenia A Villela

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to hate it, but I fell in LOVE
customer_reviews.text: It's a little pricey but it really gives your makeup brushes a deep clean. I haven't seen my brushes as clean as they were after using this product since the day I bought them.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So glad i finally bought this!!! Cuts brush cleaning time in half!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Orr

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love it!! Makes cleaning brushes so easy & enjoyable! And the small size is perfect for bathroom sinks!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana DeNoia

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: for this price it is worth it !! 25$ cleans good
customer_reviews.author: Katherinne Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning mat
customer_reviews.text: This cuts the cleaning time in half,it's easy to use and my brushes come out very clean,it even saves on brush cleaner because you don't need to use that much.
customer_reviews.author: tharrison004

customer_reviews.title: YAAASSSSS!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but it's legit! My brushes get so clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone who hates cleaning makeup brushes.
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis so I needed a way to wash my makeup brushes when my hands were bad. This completely fits the bill. The different textures on the mat are perfect for cleaning and rinsing all types of brushes. It helps get my brushes squeaky clean with minimal effort. The suction cups hold it in place well when you are using it in the sink and you can stick it to a shower wall to dry when done. I'm really happy with this purchase. I was a little hesitant because of the price but after using it for a couple of months now I think it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ZombieQT

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it does what it’s supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: This little gem cleans even the most stubborn foundation and cleans deep. Much better than using your thumb under running water. Also I have a brush from a very reputable company as I use their foundation. I had issues with not getting the brush clean enough. As I followed their cleaning instructions to the letter!! They said it was the pigment in the foundation. Ok. But I wish they could see how this brush cleaning mat got that brush SUPER clean! Thank you Sigma and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie  Washel

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you have make up brushes
customer_reviews.text: This works amazingly to clean my brushes when paired with the sigma brush cleaner. It sticks to my sink and I have no issues with it moving. It is a little small for the big face brushes but it can still be used. You do have to clean it after using it if you use waterproof makeup because there is some residue that remains. I purchases a small bristle scrub brush that I use and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: K. KalvelageTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Wish i knew this existed way before now. Its exactly what i always wanted and needed. I clean my brushes each week. Have tried various brush cleaning soaps but always felt they werent reallu getting clean until now. The mat suctions itself to the bottom of the sink and all the nubs and ridges really work to release all the gunked up makeup from your brushes. They come out so clean like new. The mat is silicone and it just rinses clean when your done. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: tnlbj

customer_reviews.title: Not bad not great
customer_reviews.text: It helps clean my brushes well but I’ve since found cheaper options that are better for me. I prefer handheld versions of this mat. I clean my sink before I use this but I still can’t help but wonder if germs are getting all over this mat from my sink. It’s also an awkward size for me. Wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor suction
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest brush/sponge cleaner to leave in the sink of my spare bathroom. The suction cups don't work well, but I don't care. It still gets five stars.
customer_reviews.author: l.c.r.

customer_reviews.title: Yasssss.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I received it in 2 days like it said, literally just got it. I have about 50 brushes that I clean once every 2 weeks and takes me about a hour. I just cleaned all my brushes and its took 15 minutes. Yes it's a little smaller than I thought but still got the job done and I was able to do multiple brushes. I think it's worth the price right there. Defiantly extremely happy with this purchases.
customer_reviews.author: krystle

customer_reviews.title: Works if you work it!
customer_reviews.text: It works like it says it does, just wish there were something that clean my brushes without effort:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brush cleaning made simple!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for a lazy person like me when it comes to cleaning my makeup brushes! This mat makes it so easy and fast to clean a bunch of brushes. The different textures are great for different brush types. It works great in my bathroom sink, which makes it easier to remember to clean them. I received this as a gift and then bought one for a friend who I knew would enjoy it. Definitely a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend
customer_reviews.text: I've seen this brush mat all over the place but always hesitated on buying my own and what a stupid mistake on my part. This is AMAZING. I was able to clean all my brushes (close to 50) in 1/3 the time it used to take me to hand wash them, And they're SUPER CLEAN. If you have makeup brushes and want to clean them, this is your best friend. I just used J&J Baby Shampoo for cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah @ The Irish Banana Review

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: WHAT HAVE I BEEN DOING WITHOUT THIS IN MY LIFE??!! Seriously, I’ve been breaking my hands washing my beauty blenders by hand and this thing has saved me so much time and effort. I should have bought this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Bigger, Better, Faster, More!
customer_reviews.text: So, sooooooo much better than the little handheld over the finger silicone brush cleaning egg thing I had been using. No more hand cramping, I save on the cleaning soap, and I can wash more than one brush at once. This mat fits into my sink perfectly and lets me clean my brushes faster and better. It's been a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST brush cleaner I have ever encountered! It's easy to use and not aggressive to your hands - I have over 50 brushes and my hands do not get tired after cleaning at least half of them - I would recommend this for anyone as a matter of fact I have the bigger version this one is for my daughter.....
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dray

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: This mat is what I have been missing. I was using a face brush that was the size of two half dollars with the same silicone texture. I can appreciate that this mat is 4x bigger and gives you options, as far as, which surface you would like to wash your brushes on. I would definitely recommend to anyone, but if your on a budget do what you have to do to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: A. McClellan

customer_reviews.title: It's not a horrible item it does a good job but it wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone raved about this item so I went ahead and placed my order. It's not a horrible item it does a good job but it wouldn't have lace well in any of my sinks. Maybe I should've gotten the glove instead. Oh and it's a bit hard to see what area is which when it's in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Petranalla

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for cleaning brushes.
customer_reviews.text: Love this for cleaning all of my makeup brushes. Such a great idea. It has suction cups on the bottom so it can suction to the counter or in the sink while cleaning your brushes. This way it doesn't move around. Came well packaged and as promised.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to try this out. So I finally got it!! Received it on time as promised. Used it today and I love it. It works awesome. I can see all my makeup coming off. My brushes ended up super clean. Love it. Best Buy so far 🙌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Zulma

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this product. It cleans my brushes spotless with no effort. Thank You for such a great product
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalsh

customer_reviews.title: Great make up brush cleaner big difference noticed using this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great make up brush cleaner big difference noticed using this vs by hand. Be careful with you can ruin by using too much pressue
customer_reviews.author: Danie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I contemplated buying this for so long because I didn't want to spend $25 on it. Ugh, if only I knew how amazing this was I never would have waited! It makes washing my many, many brushes soo much easier. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaMarieBeauty

product_meta.title: Sigma Beauty Spa Express Silicone Brush Cleaning Mat and Portable Washing Tool Scrubber Helps Clean Makeup and Cosmetic Brushes
feature_bullets: REMOVE MAKEUP RESIDUE + BACTERIA for better skin and makeup application
7 EXCLUSIVE TEXTURES wash, rinse and refine brushes of every size
COMPACT DESIGN is 32% smaller than the original Sigma Spa Brush Cleaning Mat and made of cruelty-free, vegan high-grade silicone
FITS ANY SIZE SINK and features firm-hold suction cups for easy, quick and hands-free brush cleaning
BACKED BY A FREE 2-YEAR WARRANTY for long-lasting beauty
